■Don't cook fish products in
the chicken vat.
■Don't cook two baskets in one
vat at the same time.

■Wait at least 30s in between
putting another basket in the
same vat as the first one.

■Gently shake the basket or
use tongs to get all of the
portions into the oil.
■Throw out any portions which
did not completely enter the
frying oil.
